alert.note: Alert for Izard; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 4:22PM CDT until March 27 at 10:21AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Calico Rock affecting Izard and Stone Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Calico Rock. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Pastures in Izard and Stone counties begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday morning to a crest of 20.0 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date White River Calico Rock 19.0 10.9 Thu 3 PM 13.7 20.0 16.9 20.0 7 PM 3/25 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
